message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
I understand wanting to be fair, but with inflation, I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. How about 60-40 my way?
Considering inflation, I'm willing to give a bit more, but 60-40 your way is too steep.
This is non-negotiable.  50/50 is the only fair split considering the impact of inflation on my end. Do we have a deal?
I understand your concerns about inflation, but I've already compromised. 57-43 is as far as I'll go.
Okay, this is my final offer.  48/52.  I'm really taking a hit from inflation here, and this needs to be worth my while.  Take it or leave it.
